bibl.title: St. Shenouda the Archimandrite and His Non-Monastic Interactions.
bibl.note: This paper was presented at the Ninth International Congress for Coptic Studies held at the Cathedral of Saint Mark (Cairo, Egypt), September 14-20, 2008.
bibl.seg: Hany N. Takla, St. Shenouda the Archimandrite and His Non-Monastic Interactions.
This paper was presented at the Ninth International Congress for Coptic Studies held at the Cathedral of Saint Mark (Cairo, Egypt), September 14-20, 2008.
